summary: A very simple mod that changes Serana into a Khajiit vampire.
descriptionHtml:
Are you one of the people who love Khajiit? Do you want a khajiit follower? Are you still trying to 
Decide between a vanilla companion, and a new mod companion. Well then this may very well be the mod for you! 

•What this does
 
   Changes Seranas race to a khajiit Vampire, thats it. I spent a little time
customizing her new appearence as well so she Isn\'t just a preset look. 

UPDATE

This mod now also changes Serana\'s mother into a khajiit, and edits ad small bit of her dialog. 
  
•What this does NOT do.

1.Alter any of Seranas stats, equipment, or leveling.

•Requirements

1.Skyrim
2.Dawnguard

•Recomended mods

1.CoverKhajiit (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5941)
2.CBBE (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666)
3.Accurate (khajiit chin and lips http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6956)
4.Nicer looking Khajiit (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8934)

•Q/A

Q.Is this mod compatable with any other Serana mods? 

A.This mod should be compatable with anything that does not alter Serana\'s
race or appearance.  

Q.WHY?! WHY WOULD YOU DO THIS?! WHAT IS WRONG WITH YOU!?

A.I\'m board, and I like Khajiits. 

•Install

Either put the entire Data folder into the Skyrim directory, or just put the 
.esp into the games Data folder. (Steamapps/Skyrim/Data)

•Credits

Created by TailAbNormal

Skyrim, the creation kit, and the dawnguard DLc are all properties of Bethesda.
author: TailAbNormal

Now also changes Valerica into a khajiit
Edits 1 piece of Val's dialog to reflect change making it silent
Face color Fix added
Alternate appearance file uploaded
